alert.note: Alert for Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 10 at 9:54PM AKDT until August 11 at 4:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM AKDT FRIDAY FOR LIGHTNING FOR YUKON FLATS AND SURROUNDING UPLANDS... * AFFECTED AREA...Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands. * TIMING...Until 4 AM AKDT Friday. * LIGHTNING ACTIVITY LEVEL...4. * WINDS...East 5 to 10 mph. * TEMPERATURES...In the upper 50s and lower 60s. * IMPACTS...Frequent lightning could cause new fire starts. Thunderstorms will cause gusty and erratic winds.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that conditions are occurring or will occur which could lead to the development of large and dangerous fires. It is directed toward fire agencies, and through them, to the public. Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this Red Flag Warning.
